tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_interactions (
 interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 player_id INT,
 interaction_type VARCHAR,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 message TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE player_interactions (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP, interaction_details TEXT)
CREATE TABLE player_communication (player_id INT, sender_id INT, receiver_id INT, message_content TEXT, message_timestamp TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (player_id, message_timestamp))

CREATE TABLE player_communications (
    communication_id INT,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    communication_time TIMESTAMP,
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE moderation_actions (
    action_id INT,
    moderator_id INT,
    target_player_id INT,
    action_time TIMESTAMP,
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    action_description TEXT
);
